## Carregando bibliotecas




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```
:::




## Filtrando dados e fazendo grafico de dispersão padrão




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gap_07 <- filter(gapminder, year == 2007)
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/graf-dispersao-pad-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Transformando o eixo x para escala logarítimica




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(trans = "log10")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/escala-log-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Outra forma de transformação do eixo x




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/outra-escala-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Definindo limites para o eixo y




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 95))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/limites-eixoy-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Grafico com cores normais




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/cores-normais-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Grafico usando uma paleta de cores diferente




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/cores-outras-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Usando codigos manuais para as cores




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#FF0000", "#00A08A", "#F2AD00",
                                "#F98400", "#5BBCD6"))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/codigos-cores-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Definindo as cores e tamanho dos pontos




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point(color = "darkblue", size = 3) +
  scale_x_log10()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/cores-tamanho-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Customizando títulos, rótulos de eixo e legendas




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/legenda_baixo-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Sem legenda




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/sem-legenda-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Legenda dentro do gráfico




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = c(0.1, 0.85))
```

## Aumentando o tamanho do texto e mudando para portugues




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
graf2 <- ggplot(gap_07, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, color = continent)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = c(0.1, 0.85),
        legend.key = element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 12),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 14)) +
  labs(x = "PIB Per capita (US$)", 
       y = "Expectativa de Vida (anos)", 
       title = "Expectativa de Vida vs PIB em 2007",
       color = "Continente")

graf2
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula06_files/figure-html/mudando-texto-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::
